reviews.review_text:
One of the best coffee places in Goa. Lovely food and fab service (thanks, Prashant!). We ordered the Goan breakfast and a vegan breakfast- both were delicious!

Only con is the noise from the cars when sat outside in the courtyard but not much can be done by Caravela to change that.

Overall, would definitely recommend!

Great Breakfast Place!!!
Amazing Coffee!! The best I have had!! And they use metal straws!! So eco-friendly too!! I wish they were pet friendly... But sadly they are not!!
We tried the Ros Omlette and Eggs Benedict... Both were amazing!!!

The service was excellent!!!!

One of the best Brunch/Breakfast places in Goa

I recently visited Caravela Café and Bistro and the food here is EXCEPTIONAL.

**Food:**
We ordered an American Breakfast and an English Breakfast. Cappuccino was next, no words, they were just too good. I had my American Breakfast and everything was fresh, later I got a Chocolate Cupcake, it was delicious. Even they gave a spoon along side it. Later we ordered a Bombay Sandwich. Very filling, it had tomatoes, capsicum, potatoes, cucumbers, cheese, and some onions. It was so good.
On the side was potato wedges. Perfectly crunchy and sumptuous. 10/10

**Service:**
Very fast.

**Estimated Times:**
American Breakfast with Watermelon Juice - 10-15 minutes
English Breakfast with Watermelon Juice - 10-15 minutes
Cappuccino - 5-10 minutes
Chocolate Cupcake - 1-5 minutes
Bombay Sandwich with Potato Wedges - 10-18 minutes.
Strawberry Shake - 10-16 minutes

**Atmosphere:**

Very cold, ACs everywhere, not to mention fans too! If you don’t like cold and like fans, the outside seating is for you.

Rating: 5 stars.
